en-US.title: Summa Health Pride Clinic
en-US.description: Located in Akron, Ohio, Summa Health Pride Clinic is a dedicated resource offering health services tailored to the needs of the transgender community such as hormone therapy and post-surgery care. Committed to inclusiveness with an understanding of the unique healthcare needs of transgender individuals, the clinic ensures quality care is delivered in a welcoming, respectful, and affirming environment.
